answer:
In B.C., clinics will likely have the influenza vaccine by late October or early November. Some pharmacies and clinics may have it earlier. You can contact your local health unit or pharmacy to find out when the vaccine will be available in your area. You can also use our influenza (flu) clinic locator to find a list of clinics in your area. This locator is currently being populated with clinic information for the 2019-20 influenza season, and more clinics will be added. 
Immunization Nurse
